title: Bug 6536: Add Javadoc on field in TH does nothing
OB: When selecting a field in the Type Hierarchy view, and then selecting the 'Add Javadoc' option from the context menu, nothing happens.
EB: After selecting the 'Add Javadoc' option from the context menu, the Javadoc for the selected field should be added.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the Type Hierarchy view
2. Select a field in the Type Hierarchy view
